alert.note: Alert for Washtenaw; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:16PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A line of heavy showers will impact portions of Wayne and Washtenaw Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 312 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of heavy showers along a line extending from near Warren to near Northville to near Chelsea. Movement was south at 5 mph. HAZARD...A line of heavy showers will drift slowly southward this afternoon producing torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...* Rainfall rates briefly approaching 1 inch per hour at times will be possible before activity gradually wanes and diminishes heading into the early evening hours. Heavy showers will be near... Detroit around 345 PM EDT. Canton around 350 PM EDT. Grosse Pointe around 405 PM EDT. Downtown Detroit around 420 PM EDT. Belle Isle around 425 PM EDT. Romulus, Manchester and Belleville around 445 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these torrential rains include Melvindale, Whittaker, Gibraltar, Hudson Mills Metropark, New Boston, Delhi Mills, Pleasant Lake, Rockwood, Harper Woods and Westland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
